item.description:
We'll start in the parking lot at Longfellow (the small one on the corner of Stevens and Pleasant) and ride 1.5 miles to the Hall School. An ancillary benefit to the ride will be to help spread the word about the City's proposed Neighborhood Byway that starts on Concorde St and stretches all the way to Warwick Street. See the Facebook group for details as the ride approaches:

http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=164098033644688
item.why: Promote families getting out on their bikes on their way to school or other things around the neighborhood. There are more details about what kidical mass rides are here: www.kidicalmass.org
item.name: Kidical Mass Ride
